tool_description: ⚡ The #1 Super Fast Tripadvisor Scraper to help you collect Hotels and Restaurants from Tripadvisor. ⚡
name: Tripadvisor Scraper
title: Tripadvisor Scraper

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for hotels or restaurant by location or link

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of places you want to scrape. It can be 'hotel' or 'restaurant'.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: The locations to scrape Tripadvisor listings from.

optional_parameters.name: link
optional_parameters.description: Search Page URL to start with instead of a location name.
